name: Lunchsuggester
0:
”Alexa, open lunch suggester”
”where should I go for lunch?”
”where should we go for lunch?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: lunch suggester
des: This skill will help you with deciding what is for lunch. If you are not sure or cannot decide. Just ask what's for lunch and get a suggestion, and you don't have to fight over where to go anymore!
